document.masterDocTitle: An annotated catalogue and bibliography of the taxonomy, synonymy and distribution of the Recent Vetigastropoda of South Africa (Mollusca)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated catalogue and bibliography of the taxonomy, synonymy and distribution of the Recent Vetigastropoda of South Africa (Mollusca)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Trochus cicer Menke
in Philippi, 1844 in
1842–1845
: 91 , pl. 3 , fig. 5 .
Krauss, 1848
: 98 .
Martens, 1874
: 129 , no. 98 . P. Fischer, 1878 in
1875–1880
: 264 , pl. 88 , fig. 2 . Type loc.: ‘ Caput Bonae Spei ’ [Cape of Good Hope]; type material probably lost.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Trochus zeyheri
Krauss, 1852
: 33
. Type loc.: ‘
In litore capensi
’ [on the shore of the Cape]; type material presumed lost (
Herbert & Warén 1999
).

Gibbula fulgens
Gould, 1861
: 21
.
Bartsch, 1915
: 154
, pl. 26 , figs 4–6 . Type loc.: not originally given, later cited as ‘Cape of Good Hope’ by
Bartsch ( 1915 )
; holotype in USNM ( 2046 ), figured by
Bartsch ( 1915 )
.

Gibbula musiva
Gould, 1861
: 21
. Type loc.: Simon’s Bay [Simonstown, False Bay]; lectotype in MCZ ( 169251 ), designated by
Johnson ( 1964 : 113 , pl. 6 , fig. 1 )
.

Gibbula gaudiosa
Gould, 1861
: 21
.
Bartsch, 1915
: 156
, pl. 28 , figs 1–3 . Type loc.: False Bay; lectotype in USNM ( 222 ), designated by
Johnson ( 1964 : 81 )
, figured by
Bartsch ( 1915 )
.

Gibbula thalia
Bartsch, 1915
: 157
, pl. 30 , figs 1–3 .
Turton, 1932
: 185
. Type loc.: Port Alfred, E. Cape; holotype in USNM ( 187112 ).

Gibbula globulosa
Turton, 1932
: 185
, pl. 45 , no. 1300 . Type loc.: Port Alfred, E. Cape; type material probably in OXUM , but verification required.

Gibbula approximata
Turton, 1932
: 189
, pl. 46 , no. 1320 . Type loc.: Port Alfred, E. Cape; type material probably in OXUM , but verification required.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution. Pondoland (Mbotyi) to Namibia (Luderitz); living intertidal and shallow subtidal to 12 m (form
thalia
to 150 m ).
